        private static void playFolderRecursive​(java.lang.String path,

                                        java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReference<java.lang.Integer> amountfiles)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Plays the folder recursively.
        Parameters:
        path - The path of start-folder.
        event - Event for loadAndPlay function.
        amountfiles - The number of the file - used for safety, so you can't load too many files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - error
